name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skipeon WhatsApp Bulk Messenger & Data Scraper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates the extraction of numbers from Google Maps and sends WhatsApp messages to those numbers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Your Productivity with Seamless Automation!

Skipeon is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your data extraction and messaging tasks. Ideal for businesses and individuals who need to efficiently manage and contact large sets of data, Skipeon combines advanced data scraping with automated messaging, saving you time and effort.

Key Features:

Automated Data Extraction: Instantly extract phone numbers from Google Maps listings with just a few clicks. Skipeon navigates through search results, scrolls, and collects phone numbers for you.

Seamless WhatsApp Integration: Send personalized WhatsApp messages to multiple contacts at once. Simply enter your message, and Skipeon will handle the rest, including automated scheduling if enabled.

Customizable Scheduling: Set up recurring data extraction and messaging tasks. Skipeon allows you to schedule queries and messages, ensuring your outreach is timely and consistent.

User-Friendly Interface: Manage your queries and messages easily from the extension’s popup interface. Save and edit search queries, and view extracted phone numbers directly within the extension.

Enhanced Automation: With options for random delays between messages, Skipeon mimics natural behavior to avoid detection and ensure smooth delivery.

Why Install Skipeon?

Save Time: Automate repetitive tasks and focus on what truly matters.
Boost Efficiency: Extract and communicate with leads effortlessly.
Streamline Operations: Manage and track your data extraction and messaging from a single, intuitive interface.
Install Skipeon today and transform the way you handle data extraction and messaging—experience efficiency like never before!
